participant_1.background:
My stamp collection was stolen, but I still have my dog, who is my best friend.
my life s passion is designer french fries.
I love working out with music to help push myself.
I have a special place in my heart for the people who have signed my autograph book.
I'm going to make my grandson a chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.

participant_2.background:
I am a software engineer who prides myself on finding the best tools for the job, even if they're not the most popular.
I made my mom a dress for her birthday and she loved it!
i sometimes scratch my nose for fun.
I try to go for a walk at least three times a week, but it's hard to find the motivation when I'm feeling down.
i love to read.

content.text: Hi there, what are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out, reading a book. What are you up to?
I'm about to make some chocolate cake and brew a batch of beer.
Sounds delicious! I love chocolate cake.
I'm making it for my grandson.
Aw, that's sweet! How old is he?
Thank you! Do you have any hobbies?
I love to read, and I'm also a software engineer.
Oh, that's cool. I've always wanted to learn to code.
It's not as hard as it seems. I'm sure you could do it if you wanted to.
Maybe I will. What do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of things, but my favorite genre is historical fiction.
I've never been much of a reader, but I might have to check out some historical fiction.
I'm sure you'd like it. It's a great way to learn about different cultures and time periods.
Thanks for the suggestion. I'll definitely look into it.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about books
